activities: Pursuant to its role as the employer, ARRIS requires access to it's employee's data including but not limited to the following: Name, home address, work address, hire date, birth date, job title, department, bank account information, benefit elections, payroll deductions, supervisor, nationality, This information will be for the establishment and administration of employee benefits and payroll, travel management, equal opportunity monitoring, organizational reporting, international payroll, financial reporting and training for all employees.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

recoursemech: Compliance with legal or regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution.
